remarks: Show that ` [_ R / s ]_ N ` is an atom not under ` W ` when ` -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2013.)

cdlemefr32sn2aw $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) ) /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> ( [_ R / s ]_ N e. A /\ -. [_ R / s ]_ N .<_ W ) ) $.
